text: I'm not experiencing any concerning wonkiness. It's mostly the lack of documentation in a lot of Julia packages that bring the experience down.  I compile my julia and then set the thread and procs count on startup.jl. Also, my kernel is low latency for other purposes, but not sure if that has anything to do with my nvim.

text: try running several nvim editors and check how many LSPs are running? also, if you are developing a julia package, you will most likely encounter issues of the LSP slowing down your system.
